data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 2, Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Leo Silva of Kashima smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 4, Kashima's Everaldo is on target but unsuccessful.
Kashima take a 1-0 lead thanks to Ayase Ueda.
Shimizu takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
Shimizu are coming forward and Junior Dutra gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 9, Shimizu to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Junior Dutra of Shimizu is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 12, Goal! Ayase Ueda extends Kashima's lead to 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Juan Alano.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Kashima drives forward and Everaldo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kashima pushes forward through Kento Misao, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Shimizu.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Kashima close to the penalty box.
Kashima's Leo Silva misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 23, Yuito Suzuki (Shimizu) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 28, Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Kashima.
Shimizu drive upfield and Kenta Nishizawa gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kashima defender.
In the minute 32, Shimizu takes a corner from the right.
Kashima have a goal kick.
Can Shimizu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashima's half?
In the minute 33, Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Shimizu are pushing forward but Hikaru Naruoka's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Everaldo (Kashima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 35, Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juan Alano (Kashima) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Everaldo (Kashima) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 37, Shimizu have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 39, Hwang Seok-Ho (Shimizu) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in Kashima.
Kashima drive forward but Ayase Ueda is judged offside.
In the minute 45, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, Yusuke Goto is replacing Hikaru Naruoka for the away team.
Free kick Kashima.
In the minute 49, Tomoya Inukai (Kashima) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kashima takes a corner from the left.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 50, Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 51, Shimizu are pushing forward but Renato Augusto's finish is wide of the goal.
Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In the minute 58, Shimizu's Junior Dutra attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, Kashima to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Throw-in Shimizu.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 63, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Everaldo.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Takashi Kanai is on a sub for Hwang Seok-Ho for Shimizu.
Shimizu make their third substitution with Keita Nakamura replacing Yuito Suzuki.
Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Ayase Ueda (Kashima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kashima takes a corner from the right.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
In the minute 67, Everaldo (Kashima) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Yasushi Endo.
In the minute 68, Leo Silva (Kashima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Kashima takes a corner from the right.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 70, Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Kashima.
Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 73, In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The away team replace Kenta Nishizawa with Shota Kaneko.
Kashima drive upfield and Juan Alano gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Shimizu defender.
In the minute 78, Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 79, Elsinho is booked for the away team.
Goal kick for Shimizu at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Free kick Kashima.
In the minute 80, Valdo (Shimizu) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 83, The home team replace Shoma Doi with Ryotaro Araki.
Kashima make their third substitution with Ryota Nagaki replacing Leo Silva.
Yuta Matsumura is replacing Juan Alano for the home team.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Kashima.
Kashima are coming forward and Yuta Matsumura gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
In the minute 88, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ryota Nagaki of Kashima gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Throw-in Shimizu.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Shimizu needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
Kashima are caught offside.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
